definition: to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited
"dot" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 3)/see also 點|点[dian3]
lit. to guard a tree-stump, waiting for rabbits (idiom)/to wait idly for opportunities/to trust to chance rather than show initiative
lit. a crafty rabbit has three burrows/a sly individual has more than one plan to fall back on (idiom)
lit. if the rabbit dies, the fox grieves (idiom); fig. to have sympathy with a like-minded person in distress
A rabbit doesn't eat the grass by its own burrow (idiom); One shouldn't do anything to harm one's neighbors.
pinyin: tu4 zi5 bu4 chi1 wo1 bian1 cao3

definition: you don't release the hawk until you've seen the hare (idiom)/one doesn't act before one is sure to succeed
pinyin: bu4 jian4 tu4 zi5 bu4 sa1 ying1

definition: lit. to boil the hound once it caught the rabbit (idiom)/fig. to get rid of sb once he has served his purpose
rabbits don't have long tails (idiom)/its days are numbered/won't last long
pinyin: tu4 zi5 wei3 ba5 chang2 bu5 liao3

sentences.english: The market, meet the rabbit elder brother often do.
sentences.chinese: 趕集辦年貨，遇見兔大哥。

sentences.english: Methods A model of rabbit carotid intimal injury was established by using air-drying method.
sentences.chinese: 方法用氣體乾燥術建立兔頸動脈內膜損傷模型。

sentences.english: This is business journalism animated by the spirit of the Duracell bunny.
sentences.chinese: 這是一本受到金霸王電池兔精神鼓舞的商業雜誌。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of oxygen therapy in the treatment of high altitude hemorrhagic shock in rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討氧療對高原失血性休克兔的治療作用。

sentences.english: Rose was on my lap. The rabbit had disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 羅絲坐在我的膝上，兔寶寶已經不見了。

sentences.english: Regarding the experiment animals, encaged mountain hares caught from wild field were used.
sentences.chinese: 實驗用的動物，選擇了從野外捕捉不久的雪兔個體。

sentences.english: Reevaluation of Gray and White Matter Injury after Spinal Cord Ischemia in Rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 對於兔脊髓缺血後灰質和白質損傷的重新評價。

sentences.chinese: 記得再龜兔賽跑這則伊索寓言嗎？

sentences.english: So we use the wand to conjure up the book, pencils and erasers.
sentences.chinese: 超級兔看見了一羣人在捱餓，立刻用魔棒變出了食物。

sentences.english: Rax is a kind of world-famous rabbit with high quality fur and meat.
sentences.chinese: 獺兔是世界著名的皮肉兼用兔品種。

sentences.english: This is the version of the story that we've all grown up with.
sentences.chinese: 這是從小伴隨我們長大的龜兔賽跑小說的版本。

sentences.english: HRP was injected into the hypoglossal nerve of rabbit.
sentences.chinese: 用HRP法研究了兔舌下神經的纖維成分和起源。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo evaluate the characteristic of rabbit dry eye model.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價滴用阿托品建立兔乾眼模型的優劣。

sentences.english: Feet - hare-shaped with feathering on the ends of the toes in the mature dog.

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the regulatory effects of bombesin on the activities of disaccharidase in the intestinal mucosal cells in neonatal rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鈴蟾肽對新生兔小腸黏膜雙糖酶活性的影響。
